Package ba.unsa.etf.rpr.business

Class FlightsManager

java.lang.Object
ba.unsa.etf.rpr.business.FlightsManager
public class FlightsManager extends Object
The FlightsManager class provides functionality for managing flights.

    • validateSourceName

      public void validateSourceName(String name) throws FlightBookingException
      Validate the source name for a flight.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the source
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if source name is not between 3 and 30 characters

    • validateDestinationName

      public void validateDestinationName(String name) throws FlightBookingException
      Validate the destination name for a flight.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the destination
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if destination name is not between 3 and 30 characters

    • validateSeats

      public void validateSeats(int numberOfSeats) throws FlightBookingException
      Validate the number of seats for a flight.
      Parameters:
      numberOfSeats - the number of seats for the flight
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if number of seats is not between 20 and 853

    • add

      public Flights add(Flights flight) throws FlightBookingException
      Add a new flight to the system.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight to add
      Returns:
      the added flight
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if the flight has an ID or if adding the flight fails

    • delete

      public void delete(int flightId) throws FlightBookingException
      Delete a flight from the system.
      Parameters:
      flightId - the ID of the flight to delete
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if deleting the flight fails or if it is related to quotes

      public List<Flights> searchBySourceAndDestination(String source, String destination) throws FlightBookingException

      destination - the destination of the flight
      Returns:
      a list of flights with matching source and destination
